message.raw:
fix race condition in which dCollide fails due to cleared out geom->offset_posr by ODEBody::Init()-->dGeomSetBody(g,b).
Current remedy is to call dGeomSetOffsetPosition and dGeomSetOffsetQuaternion immediately.
message.html:
fix race condition in which dCollide fails due to cleared out geom->offset_posr by ODEBody::Init()-->dGeomSetBody(g,b).
Current remedy is to call dGeomSetOffsetPosition and dGeomSetOffsetQuaternion immediately.
